name: Fedor Korshunov
body:
JavaScript backend-engineer in [AfterShip](https://www.aftership.com/), based in Hong Kong.

Previously:
* Python developer
* C developer at [Intel](http://intel.com/)

## Pet projects
* [json2text](https://www.npmjs.com/package/json2text): generate free-format text from JSON templates
* [dummy-corsproxy](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dummy-corsproxy): fork of simple-corsproxy a proxy to access resources that lack the ```Access-Control-Allow-Origin *``` header

## Contacts
* mail[at]fedor.cc
* [linkedin](https://hk.linkedin.com/in/fedorkorshunov)
